name: Aliens in t' City
description:
Aliens in t' City follows the story of Brian, who wakes up from a night out on the town to find out the earth has been taken over by Aliens.

This was created in the space of a week in Easter 2013 by 4 team members with no prior experience with Unity or Game Development.

It takes roughly 30 minutes to play through, though most of that is the second level - the objective on each level is to simply defeat all the Aliens with your limited ammo supply.
